help.faq1Question: How do I create a quiz?
help.faq1Answer: From the Home screen, tap "Start New Quiz", enter a topic you want to learn about, and tap "Generate Quiz". The AI will create personalized questions for you.
help.faq2Answer: Yes! Sample quizzes are available offline. However, generating new quizzes requires an internet connection and an OpenRouter API key.
help.faq3Question: How do I connect to OpenRouter?
help.faq3Answer: Go to Settings and tap "Connect with OpenRouter". You'll be redirected to create a free account. Once connected, you can generate unlimited quizzes (within API limits).
help.faq4Answer: Yes. Your quiz history and settings are stored locally on your device. Your OpenRouter API key is also stored locally and only used to generate quizzes.
help.faq5Answer: OpenRouter is a service that provides access to AI models. Saberloop uses it to generate quiz questions. You can create a free account with limited daily requests.

openrouter.followSteps: Follow these steps to connect with OpenRouter.
openrouter.noCreditsNeeded: You do not need to add credits initially. Several AI models are completely free to use.
openrouter.seeInstructions: See instructions for free account creation:
openrouter.step1Desc: Visit OpenRouter.ai and click the "Sign Up" button in the top right corner.
openrouter.step2Desc: Choose to sign up with Google, GitHub, or create an account with your email.
openrouter.step3Desc: On the credits page, look for the small "Skip" or "Continue without adding credits" link below the payment options.
openrouter.step4Desc: Review the permissions and click "Authorize" to connect Saberloop with your OpenRouter account.
openrouter.importantNoPayment: Important: Do not add payment. The free tier is enough to get started!
